thread.title: zedSuite Rolls Out zed Interconnect for the SAP HANA Platform
thread.title_full: zedSuite Rolls Out zed Interconnect for the SAP HANA Platform

author: Matthew Melay
title: zedSuite Rolls Out zed Interconnect for the SAP HANA Platform
text:
zedSuite ( http://www.zedSuite.com ), a leading SAP software solution and technology partner, announced that its powerful API solution, zed Interconnect, is now available for SAP Business One powered by the SAP HANA® platform. zedSuite’s enhanced zed Interconnect provides the scalability and reliability needed to provide SAP Business One users with immediate real-time information made possible by the SAP HANA® platform. zed Interconnect (formerly zed Web Integration Toolkit) integrates, automates and simplifies business processes and data sharing between SAP Business One and any custom or third party solution, all while allowing the organization to maintain full control over access to SAP Business One data. With this latest release, zedSuite builds upon zed Interconnect’s ability to synchronize real-time information from SAP Business One and existing third party solutions, and ensures that users gain the full benefits of SAP HANA® with business-ready data in their real-time environments.
“There is a growing demand for integration within the SAP Business One community and we are excited to offer a universal solution that meets the needs of SAP Business One customers,” states Scott McMahon, Vice President, zedSuite. “With SAP HANA® increasing as the platform of choice for SAP Business One, now is the time to have the right add-ons in place to help customers get the most value. With the power of SAP HANA®, zed Interconnect empowers organizations and their customers to make even better and faster business decisions than traditional databases.”
About zedSuite
zedSuite ( http://www.zedSuite.com ) is a premier Web integration partner for extending the capabilities of SAP Business One beyond the walls of small to midsize enterprises, worldwide. Providing the right level of solution integration and customization to suit each customer, zedSuite empowers growing businesses to be innovative in providing the best value they can to their own customers, employees and stakeholders through SAP Business One and web technology.
zedSuite is a member of the Group zed family of companies. Group zed ( http://www.gzed.com ) is a privately owned and operated corporation, which provides its family of industry leading companies with the strategic vision and tools to deliver on the promise of technology to customers, setting them apart from other industry peers.
